column5: Leaving Fort Francis and heading west on 11 and then north on 71 to Nestor Falls in two weeks. I wonder how's the road. I know there is work being done. Thanks, Dick

Dick, the road isn't two bad. You're right they are doing work on it. There was about 9 miles of gravel road overall when I came back a week ago. It's not a problem if you slow down and take it easy, if you don't you will have a few problems with tires. Stopped and talked with a guy at the marina in Nestor Falls and he said that all he has been doing is plugging tires because of the road.Paul
